June 16, 2007 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmans-festival-class-a
Le Carnaval Romain [arr. Wright]
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK March ('Celebration' - Condon): 1 Camborne, 96 2 Mount Charles, 94 3 St. Dennis, 93 4 St. Austell, 90 5 Helston, 87 6 Wantage, 86 7 Bodmin, 85 8 Langley, 83
Best Player: Robert Jose, euphonium (Camborne Town)
Best Soprano Cornet: Les Kneebone, Camborne Town Best Cornet: Ian Thomas, Mount Charles Best Euphonium: Robert Jose, Camborne Town Best Horn: Mark Letcher, Camborne Town Best Basses: Mount Charles
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Josie Brewer – St. Dennis Youth, Andrew Julian – St. Dennis Youth
Deportment (judge Gareth Roberts): 1 Hatherleigh (4th Section) 2 Bugle (2nd Section)
Feb. 16, 2010, 10:21 p.m. Aug. 7, 2013, 1:12 p.m.
